snippet: Kevin Na was put on the clock on the eighth hole at the Players Championship, and was unsuccessful in appealing a bad time on the 16th hole, but still emerged with a one-stroke lead.
abstract: Kevin Na was put on the clock on the eighth hole at the Players Championship, and was unsuccessful in appealing a bad time on the 16th hole, but still emerged with a one-stroke lead.

headline.main: Na in the Lead, and Trying to Keep Pace
